install.name: Content - YouTube Gallery
install.author: DesignCompass corp
install.description:
YouTubeGallery Plugin v 2.1.9 (March 2011) - A plugin to show YouTube gallery.
parameter: galleryid,width,height,playvideo,repeat,fullscreen,autoplay,relatedvideos,showinfo,thumbbgcolor,columns,showtitlr
If you provide "galleryid" or a name of the gallery only so the galley settings will be used.
example 1 (recomended): {youtubegallery=1}
example 2 (recomended): {youtubegallery=My Gallery}
so the gallery with ID 1 will be shown and the way it set in the gallery settings.
example 2 (depricated):
1,400,300,,,,,,,,3
it will show: gallery id = 1, width is 400px, height is 300px and in three columns
